description: Retrieve the details for the specified schema in the specified policy store.

parameters.name: policyStoreId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the policy store that contains the schema.

nested_items.name: policyStoreId
nested_items.description: The ID of the policy store that contains the schema.

nested_items.name: schema
nested_items.description: The body of the schema, written in Cedar schema JSON.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the schema was originally created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the schema was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: namespaces
nested_items.description: The namespaces of the entities referenced by this schema.
